title: Dayes for ever memorable, and workes of God, in the yeare past. 1645 Or a catalogue of the cities, castles, townes, and forts, that have beene taken by the Parliaments forces since Ianuary last unto this present. At the end whereof is set downe some helpes and directions how wee may render unto the Lord according to all his benefits. Imprimator, Ioseph caryl.
